content.content: Governance at a Glance! The one stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm. Updated 2021/02/11 Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  DAI remains in hot demand, with just short of 2B in total DAI supply ETH-A secured its spot on the MakerDAO mantle, as the first vault type to issue over 1B in DAI The Peg remains very strong, with the daily VWAP still hovering at $1.001  1600×483 77.3 KB ICYMI - Announcements   Vote tracking is arriving at Maker! Check out the forum post for full details! Yearn.Finance recently used a MakerDAO vault to restore user funds after an exploit on a V1 pool targeting yDAI.  Active Discussions ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ Pre-MIP discussion: PSM flapper - New @Andy_McCall brings a pre-MIP discussion on using USDC from the PSM to buyback and burn MKR tokens. Minting New DAI to Offset Lost DAI - New @jeycryptz11 makes the case for minting DAI to offset “lost” DAI sent to contract addresses both as a means of customer support and a way to counteract the deflationary pressure of the lost DAI. Seeking Consensus ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ IAM-DC Parameters (2): LRC-A, BAT-A, BAL-A, MANA-A, ZRX-A, KNC-A, RENBTC-A - Last Chance to Vote! @primoz puts forward the second round of Debt Ceiling Instant Access Module parameters for new vault types. Voting ends tomorrow, Feb. 12th. [Signal Request] Adjust ETH-A DC-IAM-line (2021-04) - Signal Extended! @ultraschuppi signals raising the ETH-A debt ceiling for the 4th time in 2021. Signal extended to get more participation, so please vote! [Signal Request] Initial Flash Mint Module Fee - New! @hexonaut signals community preference on the fee imposed for Flash Minting in anticipation of MIP25: Flash Mint Module. [Signal Request] Lower PSM-USDC-A tout Parameter - New! @hexonaut signals lowering the tout parameter for the PSM-USDC-A vault type. This change would make it cheaper to exchange DAI for USDC, a trade currently underutilized for the first PSM. Turn stablecoins DC to 0 - New! - @alexis signals changing the Debt Ceiling to 0 for all non-PSM stablecoin vaults, with options to start with USDC. Polling ends in one week (Feb. 18th)! Ongoing Initiatives ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @charlesstlouis & @Davidutro bring the latest update on the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance! Help Wanted ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available. We could always use help reviewing MIPs in the Request for Comment phase
I just want to say thanks and that these posts are very helpful!
This topic was automatically closed 7 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

discourse_list.title: Governance at a Glance: Mar. 5 - Mar. 11, 2021

content.content: Governance at a Glance! The one stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my views of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm.  Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  Total Value Locked (TVL) in MakerDAO as of today is $6.8 billion The DAI supply keeps reaching new highs with 2.6B DAI’s volume weighted average price (VWAP) is stable at $1.001   ICYMI - Announcements  The 3rd session of the Core Unit Launch Podcast will take place on Wednesday, March 17. Join our host, @juan, along with the Smart Contracts Core Unit Team to discuss their proposal. The MakerDAO community will be launching DAI on the Optimism Layer 2 solution, enabling near-instant withdrawals of DAI tokens and thus enabling wider adoption of Optimism and profiting from it.  DAI has now been integrated into the GLUFCO Service Switch to allow the direct exchange of DAI to USD or VES in Venezuela. More regional currencies are expected to be added in the future.   Active Discussions ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ [Brainstorm/Discussion] Features I Wish Existed - New @Aaron_Bartsch starts off a discussion on useful features the community would like to see come to life. How to eventually remove DAI’s dependence on USDC and other stablecoins - New @AstronautThis starts a discussion around DAI’s supposed over-reliance on other stablecoins, e.g., USDC.  Seeking Consensus ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ [Signal Request] Increase the bump / ttl parameters of FLAP auctions - New @Aaron_Bartsch proposes increasing the bump and ttl parameters of FLAP auctions to decrease the number of auctions and give participants more time to accrue funds respectively. [Signal Request] Adjust the Surplus Buffer (March/April 2021) - New @ultraschuppi proposes raising the Surplus Buffer with voting options going up to 80 MM.  Ongoing Initiatives ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro and @charlesstlouis bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance!  Help Wanted ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools  - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available. We could always use help reviewing MIPs in the Request for Comment phase
This topic was automatically closed 7 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Governance at a Glance! The one stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm. Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  As price of ETH dropped, about $10 million were liquidated in Maker this Tuesday In a turbulent market, the DAI supply didn’t move much in the past week, now sitting at 2.3B DAI’s volume weighted average price (VWAP) was $1.001   ICYMI - Announcements   @juan is starting a Core Unit Launch Pod series aimed to inform Maker users on specific Core Units’ proposals, budgets, and executions. First up: Growth Core Unit.   Active Discussions ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ Core Units I wish existed - Ongoing @iammeeoh introduces the idea of a Hiring and Careers Core Unit and @layerzero highlights the tasks of a potential Legal Core Unit. [Informal Poll] Why deploy on xdai? - Ongoing The discussion is going strong with a number of contributors analyzing the pros and cons of a xDAI-based solution. [Discussion] EuroDAI - Ongoing Creating a version of DAI pegged to the European Union’s currency? Head here to discuss.  Seeking Consensus ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ [Signal Request] Increase PSM-DC and set Debt Ceiling for USDC-A/B to 0 - New @ultraschuppi advocates to:  set the DC for USDC-A and USDC-B to 0 stop the lerp to 500M and instead set a new debt ceiling for PSM-USDC  [Signal Request] Adjusting Dust Parameter - New Given the consequences of high gas prices in a declining market, @monet-supply proposes raising the dust parameter. [Signal Request] Adjust ETH-A DC-IAM-line - New @ultraschuppi proposes raising the line for ETH-A from current 2.5B with voting options up to 15B.  Ongoing Initiatives ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro and @charlesstlouis bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance!  Help Wanted ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools  - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available. We could always use help reviewing MIPs in the Request for Comment phase

Governance at a Glance! The one stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm. Updated 2021/02/18 Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  The 2B DAI mark sits firmly in the rear-view mirror, with DAI supply at 2.25B With the latest SF increase the protocol is generating 80M DAI in annualized fees You might have heard this somewhere, but the VWAP for DAI this week was $1.001   ICYMI - Announcements   @Aaron_Bartsch put together an awesome tutorial for adjusting DCs with the IAM   MIPs Portal: A community developed site to explore all our MIPs is live, thanks @smaugho and team!   Active Discussions ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ [Discussion] EuroDAI - New @SebVentures discusses possible paths forward for a long desired DAI pegged to the Euro. [RWA] Things I don’t like about Real-World Assets - New @e18r inspires a discussion about the push for RWA and the challenges of the asset class. Should we explore launching on Binance Smart Chain? - New @smaugho explores options for cheaper transactions on the Binance Smart Chain.  Seeking Consensus ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ [Signal Request] Increase ETH-A DC IAM gap - New @Aaron_Bartsch and @ultraschuppi 's powers combined, bring an ETH-A DC-IAM gap signal request. Voting ends tomorrow, Feb. 25th. Adjustments to ‘beg’ and ‘chop’ parameters for UNI LP and ETH-B Vaults - New! @primoz and @Jiecut signal adjusting the ‘beg’ (auction bid increment in %) and ‘chop’ (penalty fee) for UNI LP Vaults and ETH-B respectively. [Signal Request] Move to Percentage IAM - New! @Planet_X signals community preference on switching the Debt Ceiling Instant Access Module increases over from a flat amount to a percentage.  Ongoing Initiatives ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available.
